name: Subtentacular
description:
A game with day and night cycles.

During the day; kill enemies and collect energy orbs, then go back to your bases to fill up their energy.

At night; go back to your bases and protect them.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

  • Arrows or WASD to move
  • Spacebar to shoot main weapon
  • Shift to shoot subweapon

GAMEPAD CONTROLS

  • Left stick or D-Pad to move
  • A to shoot main weapon
  • X to shoot subweapon

NOTE: This game was developed in GameMaker Studios 2 for the #noticeme game jam organized by Opera and Yoyo Games. This is the HTML5 version of the game that was submitted on the OperaGX browser: https://gxc.gg/games/yx6mc3/SUBTENTACULAR/
